title: ANPR - Automatic Number Plate Detection
description: Engineered a Machine Learning model for license plate recognition
Implemented a Fast API endpoint for seamless integration
Achieved 94.7% accuracy and reduced processing time to under 1 second
Collaborating with Vadodara police for deployment across Toll Plazas

title: Yoga Pose Detector and Corrector
description: Developed a live yoga pose detector and corrector
Gives individual instructions and feedback to help user get the perfect pose
Added a Translucent ideal pose outline for visual aid to user
used media pipe pose to analyse different pose and store its data for future reference

title: Quick Ben
description: Developed a customizable web scraper and summarizer
Implemented source-end page scraping functionality
Created an external module for expanded web scraping capabilities
Currently integrating image functionality and file format conversion

title: 4sync
description: Enhanced module to support multiple platforms (Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, Android)
Implemented a flexible library interface for seamless application integration
Developed a user-friendly system for accessing synced files across all devices
Ensured automatic document updates to reflect real-time changes

title: System Automation
description: Created a suite of automated tasks for common system operations
Implemented application launch on startup and key-bind triggered multi-app launch
Developed automated data backup and system health checkup features
Integrated automatic application updates with customizable parameters

title: Automation Testing
description: Developed a frontend automation testing framework
Automatically generates reports on current vulnerabilities, non-existing pages, and performance reviews
Provides complexity assessment and seriousness of identified issues

title: Deforestation Detector
description: Created a model to detect mass deforestation over a fixed period
Implemented alert system for authorities when deforestation exceeds set thresholds
Utilized satellite image processing and computer vision techniques

title: RecruitME
description: Developed an AI platform to streamline the recruiting process
Implemented AI-powered personality and technical assessments
Increased accuracy of candidate evaluation using natural language processing

title: Noteverse
description: Developed a cross-platform document reader (CPDR)
Implemented synchronization of bookmarks, annotations, notes, and page numbers across devices
Ensured a smooth reading experience with automatic syncing
